channel.title: Changing xp rate
channel.description: How do i slow down my training, i want it to be like 10x faster then runescape.

item.title: Changing xp rate
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

mager dd:

go to client.java and search for the number of the exp rate or strength and when you get to the one that says the exp rate change it to 400 on all the numbers just scroll down and there will be another one for ranged,i would post what it looks like but im not on my hosting comp srry

So is it this but that i change to 400?

[code]public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        if (lvl >= level) {
            return output;
        }
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
    }
    return 0;
}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
    if (playerRights <= 1) {
    int points = 0;
    int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 99;
} else if (playerRights >= 2) {
    int points = 0;
    int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
}
    return 135;
}[/code]
